definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Select a project with a project configuration to rename.
sentences.chinese: 选取要重新命名专案组态的专案。

sentences.english: Use this dialog box to clear undesirable inherited properties for a project configuration.
sentences.chinese: 使用本对话方块来清除专案组态中意外继承的属性。

sentences.english: Local government has set up a team to investigate the case.
sentences.chinese: 目前，当地政府已成立专案组调查这一事件。

sentences.english: Be in in round, case group will escape to the Lan Xiaojun of remote mountains to subdue eventually.
sentences.chinese: 在一次围捕中，专案组终将逃到深山的兰小军制服。

sentences.english: Under the investigation to Qian Fei, the team confirmed eventually that Qian Fei was her real name.
sentences.chinese: 经过对钱菲的调查，专案组最终确定钱菲是其真名。

sentences.english: This interface provides internal-only access to project configuration properties.
sentences.chinese: 这个介面提供仅限内部的专案组态属性存取。

sentences.english: Team see the time is ripe, immediately start mobilizing police officer.
sentences.chinese: 专案组见时机成熟，马上调集警力展开围捕行动。

definition: to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
to deploy surveillance/to put under surveillance
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
